summary: Versioned Partial Return System - Full testing completed. All backend APIs working correctly (13/13 tests passed). Frontend PartialReturnVersionWorkspace and ManagerDashboard integration working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Version 3 (OC-7266(3)) has 0 items - this is expected when all items from previous version were returned
The partial return column on dashboard correctly shows versions from partial_return_versions table
Version history is correctly maintained and displayed in the workspace
seed_data_creation: Test versions OC-7266(1), OC-7266(2), OC-7266(3) already exist for order_id=7266
context_for_next_testing_agent: Versioned partial return system fully functional. Backend APIs: /api/return-versions/active, /api/return-versions/version/{id}, /api/return-versions/order/{id}/versions, /api/return-versions/version/{id}/return-item, /api/return-versions/order/{id}/create-version. Frontend: PartialReturnVersionWorkspace at /partial-return/{versionId}, ManagerDashboard shows versions in 'Часткове повернення' column. Test data: order_id=7266 has 3 versions (1 and 2 archived, 3 active).

backend_api./api/return-versions/active: PASS - Returns active versions for dashboard
backend_api./api/return-versions/version/{id}: PASS - Returns version details with items and history
backend_api./api/return-versions/order/{id}/versions: PASS - Returns all versions for an order
backend_api./api/return-versions/order/{id}/create-v: PASS - Creates new version (tested error cases)

frontend_workspace.version_display: PASS - Shows OC-7266(3) with correct format
frontend_workspace.customer_info: PASS - Shows customer name, phone, email
frontend_workspace.rental_period: PASS - Shows dates and overdue indicator
frontend_workspace.items_section: PASS - Shows items with accept button (or 'all returned' message)
frontend_workspace.version_history: PASS - Expandable section showing all versions
frontend_workspace.close_version_button: PASS - Button visible for active versions

frontend_dashboard.partial_return_column: PASS - Shows versions from partial_return_versions table
frontend_dashboard.version_card: PASS - Shows display_number, customer, phone, items_count, days_overdue
